Groups.DisplayName: Sonic Riders: Zero Gravity Voice Mod Remastered - Configuration

Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: This system determines which voices will be used within the game. Sonic Riders: Zero Gravity Voice - English or Japanese.
Use the English voice made for Sonic Riders: Zero Gravity (Jason Griffith)
Use the Japanese voice made for Sonic Riders: Zero Gravity (Jun'ichi Kanemaru)
